meta noextract
meta arches["foo", "bar", "386"]

incdir <some/path>

strflags0 = "foo", strflags1
strflags1 = "bar"

expressions {
	f0	int8	(if[value[X] & Y])
	f1	int8	(if[X & Y == Z])
	f2	int8	(if[X & Y & Z == value[X] & A])
	f3	int8	(if[X & (A == B) & Z != C])
}
